trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> event occurs when the selection state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> changes from selected to deselected or deselected to selected.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>evento ocorre quando o estado de seleção de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>alterações de selecionado para deselected ou desmarcada a selecionada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> will not occur if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>não ocorrerá se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>está no modo virtual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemSelectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemSelectionChangedEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> cujo estado de selecção foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> cujo estado de selecção foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the item's state has changed to selected; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate the item's state has changed to deselected.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar o estado do item foi alterado para selecionada; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para indicar o estado do item foi alterado para deselected.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the item's state has changed to selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se Estado o item é alterado para selecionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item's state has changed to selected; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the item's state has changed to deselected.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o estado do item foi alterado para selecionada; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o estado do item foi alterado para deselected.

trans-unit.source: Gets the item whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o item cujo estado de selecção foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> cujo estado de selecção foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the item whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do item cujo estado de selecção foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> cujo estado de selecção foi alterada.
